brief_summary.textblock:
The project consists of qualitative interviews with all the members of the obesity team
      (endocrinologist, bariatric surgeon, dietician, psychologist,..) in different Flemish
      hospitals. These interviews have the aim to gain insight into the current practice about
      counseling patients with bariatric surgery, with a focus on medication counseling. This will
      make it possible to assess the strengths and weaknesses in the current practice of obese
      patients who will undergo and have undergone bariatric surgery.

clinical_study.brief_title: Multidisciplinary Approach and Counseling of the Obese Patient Before and After Bariatric Surgery

detailed_description.textblock:
The project consists of qualitative interviews with all the members of the obesity team
      (endocrinologist, bariatric surgeon, dietician, psychologist,..) in different Flemish
      hospitals. These interviews have the aim to gain insight into the current practice about
      counseling patients with bariatric surgery, with a focus on medication counseling. We will
      do a benchmarking and also qualitative analyses of the interviews using Nvivo 10.

      This will make it possible to assess the strengths and weaknesses in the current practice of
      obese patients who will undergo and have undergone bariatric surgery.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  All the members of the obesity team should be prepared to participate in the study

study_pop.textblock: The different health care professionals of the obesity team

clinical_study.official_title: Multidisciplinary Approach and Counseling of the Obese Patient Before and After Bariatric Surgery: Qualitative Interviews

primary_outcome.description: We will do a benchmarking and a qualitative research to give an overview of the counseling of obese patients before and after bariatric surgery and to identify the barriers of to a multidisciplinary approach in the counseling of bariatric surgery.
primary_outcome.measure: Difference between multidisciplinary approach in bariatric surgery population in Flanders and the guidelines
primary_outcome.time_frame: The interviews will be performed once
